The claim falsely stated that Gov: Jerry Brown of California signed a bill banning teachers from carrying firearms and shooting back at school shooters.
The claim was circulated in response to: implying a connection between the events.
The bill in question: AB 424, was actually passed and signed by Gov. Brown several months before the Florida shooting, in October 2017.
The main effect of AB 424 is that it eli: 12 school district officials to grant special authorization for teachers and other school employees to carry firearms on school grounds.
